thread.title: Cargo Auctions - Advanced Online Load - Board
thread.title_full: Cargo Auctions - Advanced Online Load - Board

title: Cargo Auctions - Advanced Online Load - Board
text: - Already integrated with multiple Freight Shipping applications in USA/CAN - 75.000 - 100.000 posted FTL & LTL loads (daily) - Built-in Marketing Affiliation Program (profit share with agents who refer/register carriers with your website) - Easily expandable for Global Operation Note: Carriers are the only paying customers (read details below) Carriers can have a free account (to post available trucks without a paid-subscription), but need to upgrade to a paid-subscription to search loads and view matching loads. As for Shippers/brokers accounts, they are completely free (posting loads and searching trucks is free) Please note that the application comes only with existing shippers/brokers and their posted loads (75.000 - 100.000 daily loads) You will gain revenue when you register your own customers (Carriers with paid-subscriptions). Why do Shippers/Brokers use it? - Post loads Publically or Privately - Create a list of Preferred and Excluded carriers - Send automated load-alerts to carriers and receive carriers' rates/bids online - Search trucks by origin, multiple destination, radius, eq. type, etc. - Browse/match trucking companies by location - Validate carriers' safety records instantly - Manage your active, scheduled, covered and outstanding loads on a single page Why do Carriers use it? - Post trucks, free - Search/match loads and submit rates/bids along with attached documents - View shippers' credit reports...etc.
